body.name: Inus R32 Electric Heated Bidet Toilet Seat Elongated, Warm Water, Smart Heated Water Luxury Bidet Toilet Seat with Remote Control, Night Light, Air Dryer, Self Cleaning, Tankless & Temperature Control

asinVariationValues.variationValue: N22 with Heated Seat & Air Dryer

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 18 mins
features: EASY INSTALLATION: Installing your heated bidet toilet seat elongated model is a breeze, with all parts and comprehensive instructions included. You don't need a plumber – the easy DIY installation takes under 30 minutes, granting you immediate access to a world of comfort. Upgrade your bathroom experience today with the ultimate blend of comfort, hygiene, and modern luxury.

COMFORT & HYGIENE: Experience the ultimate in comfort, hygiene, and sanitation with our advanced bidet electric toilet seat. Its tankless/direct water system ensures effective, gentle yet powerful cleansing, enhancing your toilet seat's longevity by preventing dirt, stains, and buildup. The elegant design includes a stainless steel, corrosion-resistant nozzle for unmatched cleanliness, seamlessly blending form and function for aesthetic appeal and superior performance.

PERSONALIZED WASH: Heated water bidet toilet seat with a remote that lets you tailor your cleansing experience to perfection. With a simple touch, take command of your bidet's heated water and seat temperature settings, offering personalized comfort like never before. Adjust the nozzle position and water pressure to match your preferences, enjoying a refreshing and soothing clean.

DRYER: This advanced bidet electric toilet seat with dryer provides the ultimate touch of comfort and cleanliness. Say goodbye to traditional methods and experience the modern convenience of a fully integrated drying system. Elevate your hygiene journey with this innovative addition. Lessen irritation and enhance comfort with the help of the built-in dryer.

ILLUMINATE THE DARK: Illuminate Your Path with Subtle Elegance. Experience the added convenience of our bidet electric toilet seat's built-in night light feature. This gentle, ambient illumination offers guidance during late-night visits, enhancing safety and comfort without the need for blinding bathroom lights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We absolutely love this, especially with all the extras. Does the job, the temperature control for the water us a must, the heated seat a bonus you will love. Also the dry with air is a must you will want. Easy install, well worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Possibly the BEST choice Brand Name for bidets.
reviews.reviewText: After much research I chose the IMUS brand of bidets--one with air dry capacity, the other without.I have had these 2.5years and they are great.Major Benefit :These are instant-on, tankless water heaters you don't have to run a separate hot water line nor do you waste any energy heating and reheating a water reservoir so typical in most other brands...(Not to MENTION: once those reservoirs run out: alluvasudden!! - one has the shock of a cold-water rinse! AAARRRGGGHHH!!! ) ;-/The lowest setting of the heated seat is a wonderful luxury in winter and can be turned off altogether in spring/summer or whenever ambient temperatures allow.The air dry works fine, with the only drawback being the time added the time to dry (so I seldom use it); however, if one has hemorrhoids or other sensitivities to the touch in the perineal area, the air dry is an essential game-changer. (How do YOU spell relief? ;-)Perhaps because of its long history producing bidets, this Korean company provides what I find is the best feature-packed price-to-quality value I have found in this category.AMERICANS: smarten up! Once initiated, you'll wonder why we're so far "behind" the rest of the world!Not only is a bidet so much more hygienic, it ultimately pays for itself in the amount you save when your toilet paper usage plummets!Yah....go ahead...no reason NOT to--UNLESS YOU HAVE NO ELECTICAL OUTLET/AVAILABILITY IN THE BATHROOM!)OH, and although it is clearly stated in the instructions.... you absolutely cannot sit on thetoilet lid once closed. It will not stand the weight.Hopefully you can 'stand the wait' for you new bidet once you've ordered! ;-D

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and works well for 2 months, the water beam seems thin and pressure limited. The dryer not so effective, I never used that feature after initial tries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice starter Bidet Great Features
reviews.reviewText: This is the Chevy of Bidet Not the Cadillac :-)Overall Great Value. Been looking for bidets for a while. Kind of nervous and did not want to spend 500+ on something I was unsure of.Easy to set up and use.I am still trying to get the family on board, but I will never go back to toilet paper. This thing cleans your butt well. No more underwear streak here LOL

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bidet and reasonable price.
reviews.reviewText: I have used more expensive bidets, and found them to be excellent to use. Other than a remote control, this one meets all the performance of the more expensive models.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bidet checks all the boxes, heated seat, heated water, adjustable nozzle, adjustable power settings, and there are a lot more features. The best feature is an eco mode which reduces the power required to run the unit. Installing wasn't too bad, it's fully adjustable to fit your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We bought this to replace our more expensive Biobidet that broke after about 18 months. This one is very nice, one thing I do miss is the dryer that was on my other bidet. These are so nice! After you have one you will wonder how you lived without it for so long!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When plugging the unit into your bathroom outlet you may want to first reset the gfi.My husband installed the bidet and he couldn't get the remote to work. I called INUS and they had me troubleshoot the remote. They told me to return it so I started the process of return. My husband troubleshooted the remote once again and he got it to work. I love this item it was recommended by my daughter she purchased three of this same item. I would recommend this item I love it.
